overview:
Nick Hill is currently Engineering Manager at Jive Software, working on Jive’s flagship enterprise collaboration platform, Clearspace. Nick joined Jive early on in 2005 and has served in roles in Professional Services, Engineering, and Engineering Management. Prior to joining Jive Software, Nick was a Software Engineer at the California Institute for Telecommunications and Information Technology, prototyping software applications for responding to crises and unexpected events.

Nick holds a B.S. in Electrical Engineering from the University of California, San Diego.
